directions.step:
Microwave baking bars and shorteningin mediumfor 1 min.,stir.continue additional 10 to 20 second intil smooth. Sit in almonds.
Pour into foil- lined 8" square baking pan.Chill until firm
Place morsels in a heavy- duty plastic bag. Microwave in high for 30 to 45 seconds. knead until smooth.
Cut tiny corner from a bag, drizzle over candy .Chill until set.
Remove foil., break into pieces.
